name: DisplayFeatureSubScreen
desc: Positions [child] such that it avoids overlapping any [DisplayFeature] that splits the screen into sub-screens.

fields.name: anchorPoint
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.DisplayFeatureSubScreen.anchorPoint} The anchor point used to pick the closest sub-screen.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
